target_sites.name: mlbprediction
target_sites.angle: Analytics, advanced stats (xBA, WAR, xFIP), data-driven

target_sites.name: bestmlbhandicapper
target_sites.angle: Sharp money, expert handicapping, situational angles

news_items.headline: Dodgers cut reliever Banda after 2 World Series titles
news_items.description: The Dodgers designated reliever Anthony Banda for assignment on Friday after the left-hander won two consecutive World Series rings with the team.

news_items.headline: Mark McGwire returns to Athletics in player development role
news_items.description: Former slugger Mark McGwire is back with his first organization, rejoining the Athletics as a special assistant to player development.

news_items.headline: Sources: 1B Paul Goldschmidt, Yankees finalizing 1-year deal
news_items.description: First baseman Paul Goldschmidt is finalizing a one-year contract to return to the Yankees, sources told ESPN's Jeff Passan on Friday.

news_items.headline: Brent Suter, Angels finalize 1-year, $1.25 million contract
news_items.description: Left-hander Brent Suter and the Los Angeles Angels finalized a $1.25 million, one-year contract on Friday.

news_items.headline: Yasiel Puig found guilty of obstruction, lying to officials
news_items.description: A jury has found ex-major league outfielder Yasiel Puig guilty of obstruction of justice and lying to federal officials, the U.S. Attorney's Office said Friday.

news_items.headline: Reds' Ashcraft, Rays' Uceta continue player arbitration wins
news_items.description: Pitchers Graham Ashcraft and Edwin Uceta won their salary arbitration cases Friday, improving players to 5-0 this year.
